page.title: 07Attitudes in Uzmaston area
page.content: The area is covered by a Community Council which meets in Uzmaston Church Hall monthly to discuss all aspects of planning and other matters of local concern. There are 14 members and representatives from the County and Preseli Councils are invited. Attendances are always good. The Community Council owns Uzmaston Village Green. Matters discussed recently have been:- plans for new roads and homes, parking in dangerous places, road safety for children on bicycles, street cleaning, large overhanging trees on the New Road, buses, closure of Rhos School. Also the existence and condition of footpaths particularly Fortunes Frolic, a riverside walk, where plans to provide wooden circuit apparatus costing Â£1500, for recreation purposes are under consideration.
